title: Roofing Salesperson / Representative
description:
**Roof Plus** in **Point Pleasant, NJ** is calling all motivated **Roofing Salesperson/Representatives** to apply to join our amazing team **full-time**!

 **WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN OUR TEAM**


We are a busy roofing company that invests in our team and offers real opportunities for career growth. This Roofing Salesperson/Representative position works a **full-time schedule** of **8 am and 6 pm, with varying end times, and some Saturday work is available but not required.** This position earns a **great commission** resulting in earnings of **$70,000-$130,000 per year**, based on skills and performance. We provide our team with **excellent benefits and perks**, including **100% employer-paid health, dental, life, and Aflac insurance, a matching 401(k) plan, paid vacations, and paid holidays**. We also make it easy to apply! If we have your attention, please continue reading!

 **ABOUT ROOF PLUS**


Roof Plus is a veteran-owned company with the goal to make roof repair and replacement as easy as possible for our customers. We understand the overwhelming feelings that home repairs can bring, that's why our team takes the time to explain the best choices for homes and the families in them. If there's a need for roofing repairs, roof cleaning, siding repairs, gutter repairs, window installation, or even full roof replacement, we have it covered.


Our team is **honest, dependable, and different**. Always striving to be better than the customer expects, our team works together to make it happen. To reward our employees for their WOW service we do everything we can to support them including **regular training to advance skills**. And we prefer to **promote from within**. If you enjoy a **happy, friendly work culture** you'll fit right in with Roof Plus.

 **ARE YOU A GOOD FIT?**


We are looking for someone who is motivated to do quality work and further their career as full-time Roofing Salesperson/Representative. Ask yourself: Are you an effective communicator? Do you present yourself professionally? If so, we want to meet you!

 **WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU**


In this full-time sales role, you play an important role in ensuring revenue growth, profitability, and customer satisfaction. You work with provided leads to evaluate our client's roofing needs then clearly, accurately, and honestly explain the best options for them. Referring to customer requests and specifications, you make appropriate product and service offerings.


You act as a liaison between the customer and the company to ensure effective communication and manage expectations. Following up on customer questions, needs, or concerns, you make sure customers are educated about the process and are excited to work with us. Closing leads and ensuring that customers are happy gives you a great sense of accomplishment!


If you can do this and meet the following requirements, apply today!

* Valid driver's license with relatively clean driving record
* Comfortable with heights
* Some sales experience

**Roofing sales experience is a huge plus!**

 **APPLY NOW FOR THIS ROOFING SALESPERSON / REPRESENTATIVE POSITION**


Do you have a positive attitude that contributes to high company morale? Are you goal-oriented and self-motivated? Can you connect with our customers and build strong relationships? If you answered yes, apply now using our initial **quick and easy mobile-optimized application**.


Location: 08742

title: Install Manager
description:
**Efficient Air Service** in **Riverdale, NJ** is looking to hire a **full-time Install Manager** to coordinate our activities and serve as a link between the office and the field. Are you looking to **grow your career** in HVAC management? Do you have some general knowledge of accounting? Would you like to work with a **respectful office team** in a **supportive company environment**? If so, please read on!


This HVAC management position earns a **competitive salary** of **$70,000 - $90,000/year**, depending on experience. We provide **great benefits**, including **health, vision, a 401(k) with match, paid time off (PTO), incentives, bonuses, year-round work, and uniforms & a company vehicle** if applicable. If this sounds like the right HVAC management opportunity for you, apply today!

 **THE HISTORY AND CORE VALUES THAT GUIDE EFFICIENT AIR SERVICE**


Efficient Air Service is a family-owned business founded in 2005 by Albert M. Balonze, Jr. Since then, we have strived to take pride in our work, be honest, and have the integrity it takes to gain repeat customers. Our continuously trained technicians are confident in their abilities to provide 100 percent satisfaction on any and every job, each time.


In the field and in the office, our employees support one another in this fast-paced environment. We are a dedicated team of friendly attitudes with a strong work ethic. Our team is the backbone of our company which is why **we celebrate their individual successes and growth,** as well as the **overall achievements of the company.** As the company grows, we continuously work to preserve our core small business values by treating our employees with **respect and integrity.**

 **A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN INSTALL MANAGER**


As an Install Manager, you are the grease that keeps the wheels of our company turning. As the link between our office and the technicians in the field, you make sure that we are organized, quality-oriented, and productive. Calling upon your general knowledge of job costing, you ensure that we stick to our budget and maintain profitability. With efficiency, you develop plans for installs and ensure that our technicians have the materials they need to fulfill our contractual obligations. You also see to it that our technicians are well trained and that every installation is done according to established policies and procedures. With you in the office coordinating the work, we meet our company goals, and our employees progress in their careers. Under your watchful eye, our business thrives, and you take great satisfaction in seeing our success!

 **QUALIFICATIONS**

* 2+ years of management experience
* General understanding of the HVAC, Sheetmetal & Plumbing industry
* Understanding of accounting as it relates to the industry
* HVAC service & install experience
* Basic computer skills, including Microsoft Office Suite
* Valid Driver's License
* Excellent oral, written, and interpersonal communication skills
* Knowledge of local code requirements
* Attended vocational school


Are you efficient and organized? Can you lead and inspire others to do their best? Do you have an eye for detail? Are you a team player? If yes, you might just be perfect for this position!

 **ARE YOU READY TO JOIN OUR TEAM?**


If you have some familiarity with job costing and feel that you would be right for this HVAC management job, please fill out our initial **3-minute, mobile-friendly application**. We look forward to meeting you!


Location: 07457
company_description: Since 2005, Efficient Air has strived to be the top trusted residential HVAC service company in Northern New Jersey. Come join the best of the best!

title: Clinical Case Manager
description:
\\*\\*\\*This is a **Full-Time** & **In-Person** role located at our Brooklyn office. \\*\\*\\*

**We are Looking for CNAs, LPNs, Medical Asst. to operate in a Case Manaagement role.**

***Remote Focus*** provides Chronic Care Management, Remote Patient Monitoring, and Telehealth services to Medicare members with chronic medical conditions. We are currently seeking an **Case Manager** to join our team.

The Case Manager plays a vital role in providing case management and remote monitoring for a caseload of patients with chronic health conditions. Essential duties and responsibilities include:

* Follow-up on clinical assessments and care plans to facilitate applicable goals and interventions of the client
* Ensure the patient’s remote monitoring is being measured. Address and escalate any concerning measurements with the medical provider
* Advocate for and support the client while engaging with health care providers on the patient’s behalf with the goal of reducing emergency room visits and/ or hospitalizations
* Provide clinical support by providing consultation, education information around conditions and interventions to maintain focus on outcomes and best practices
* Submit progress notes and documents, records, and other related reports in an organized, timely and accurate manner as per policy and procedure
* Provide outreach and engagement of the patient to ensure all services are provided
* Provide crisis intervention and follow-up
* Perform other related duties as assigned

SKILLS AND/OR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED

* Bachelors **OR** at least 2+ years experience in related human services providing direct services to patients diagnosed with chronic health conditions or other disabilities **OR** 2+ years of experience as a medical assistant or related position
* **Bilingual language required: Spanish/English**
* Effective interpersonal, communication, and teamwork skills required
* Experience with harm reduction and motivational interviewing techniques strongly preferred

**Work Location:** 2003 Coney Island, Brooklyn, NY

**Job Type:** Full-time

**Schedule:** 9 am - 5 pm; M-F

**Starting Salary:** $50,000.00

**Benefits:**

* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Paid time off
* Parental leave

**Experience:**

* Care Coordination or Medical Assistance: 1 year (Required)

Pay: From $50,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Paid time off
* Parental leave

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
